==Trivia==
{{NorseMyth|refers to the rivers that existed in [[Wikipedia:Ginnungagap|Ginnungagap]] ("the Primordial Void"). These rivers were filled to the brim with poisons that eventually froze over. When the rivers flooded and overflowed, with the help of [[Wikipedia:Niflheim|Niflheim]] ("the World of Ice and Darkness"), the toxins appeared as rain and filled the void. The toxins are said to have flowed in [[Wikipedia:Hvergelmir|Hvergelmir]], one of the major springs, the assumed source of all water, and home to the dragon [[Wikipedia:Nidhogg|Nidhogg]] and plenty other serpents.}}
